name: We're In Attack Position Now
Text: 'Each pilot deploys -1 (or -2 if an admiral) aboard a capital starship.  Each capital starship with a pilot character aboard is immune to attrition < 4 (or adds 2 to immunity if starship already has immunity).  During each of your control phases, opponent loses 1 Force for each battleground site your general or commander controls that is related to a system you occupy.',
